game.name: Dwarf Saga
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Embark on a premium match-3 adventure! Help the luckiest dwarf build history's first surface village by solving puzzles, finding runestones, and defeating a treacherous villain's plot. Enjoy stunning visuals, a charming story, and the quest to earn legendary status!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a premium match-3 adventure! Help the luckiest dwarf build history's first surface village by solving puzzles, finding runestones, and defeating a treacherous villain's plot. Enjoy stunning visuals, a charming story, and the quest to earn legendary status!
